value.title: Top 5 things to get started with Azure Synapse Analytics
value.excerpt: Getting started with Azure Synapse Analytics? Here are 5 things you should know as you begin your journey! Already been using Synapse SQL dedicated pools? Are you aware of these items?   Connect with Shane: https://www.linkedin.com/in/shanerisk/   Best Practices: https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/synapse-analytics/sql/best-practices-dedicated-sql-pool

value.title: Understanding the TIMELINE in DAX Studio
value.excerpt: We brought Marco in to help explain the TIMELINE update within DAX Studio. This can help you understand performance a bit deeper when optimizing your DAX and models. This is one to watch!  DAX Studio https://daxstudio.org  Marco Russo https://twitter.com/marcorus https://www.linkedin.com/in/sqlbi/ https://sqlbi.com

value.title: Using Custom Format Strings in Power BI Desktop
value.excerpt: Patrick walks you through how to use custom format strings in Power BI Desktop. From dates and time to numbers, he calls out some things to look out for. value.title: Using DAX to format a list of values in Power BI Desktop
value.excerpt: Alberto Ferrari joins Patrick to walk through how you can use DAX to format a list of values within Power BI Desktop. Original Quick Measure video - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=SjSKCZtiNlI  Alberto's article - https://www.sqlbi.com/blog/alberto/2018/12/20/displaying-a-list-of-selected-months/
